>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/ibc/apps/fee/v1/channels/{channel_id}/relayers/{relayer}/payee"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Payee returns the registered payee address for a specific channel given the relayer address

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"unique channel identifier","name":"channel_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"the relayer address to which the distribution address is registered","name":"relayer","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A successful response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"QueryPayeeResponse defines the response type for the Payee rpc","properties":{"payee_address":{"type":"string","title":"the payee address to which packet fees are paid out"}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
